function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited information for policy decisions","Impact":"Ineffective policy implementation","Mitigation":"Increased data collection and analysis","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, simulation models","People":"Policy makers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Unknown effects of anti-contagion policies on infection rates","Impact":"Ineffective containment of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Conducting direct measurements of policy effects","Technologies":"Data collection tools, statistical analysis","People":"Public health researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of historical precedent for the current pathogen and policies","Impact":"Uncertainty in policy effectiveness","Mitigation":"Combining direct measurements and numerical simulations for decision-making","Technologies":"Simulation models, data analytics tools","People":"Policy makers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
